alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 11:33PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lake County through 1215 AM EDT... At 1132 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Harris, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Eustis, Tavares, Mount Dora and Howey-In-the-hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County
